html:
1.4.24  8:18 am   could you give me an inaccurate definition of "music"

      sort of. it is a diesel engine, but that's also not entirely inaccurate

1.4.24  8:15 am   do you have any idea why people call it "breaking news"?

      no, but i'm also not surprised. 'break' is one of those common auxiliary words that shows up in all kinds of phrases

1.4.24  7:41 am   How do i combat the universe 

      can't. all combats are included within the universe. if you think you are combatting the universe directly, you are probably just combatting yourself

1.4.24  5:49 am   Are role models actually just a conspiracy to poison children's minds with dominant cultural values?

      no, but the option is always there

1.4.24  4:40 am   how do you recommend reading this page?

      left-to-right through the line, then top-to-bottom line by line within each question/answer, starting with the question, then the answer. but the question/answer pairs can be read in any order. it might make slightly more sense to read the questions in chronological order (bottom to top), in which case you'd have to decide on a starting point

1.4.24  3:55 am   can i call you sonny boy

      you could try, but i don't know if it's going to work

1.4.24  3:52 am   my left shoulder / trap muscle is mostly better thank you for joining me on this storied journey 

      you're welcome

1.4.24  2:54 am   What's a question you wish people would ask you?

      something they would ask without me asking them to ask it

1.4.24  12:43 am   what's your favorite kind of dog?

      i don't know any of the kinds

1.4.24  12:16 am   can you show me how you might use an eq on a main kick drum?

      only if you can prove to me that it doesn't sound good to you the way it already is

1.3.24  11:45 pm   hey, bill. what's your favorite niche history fact?

      every past moment was once in the future

1.3.24  9:55 pm   Do you like reading books?

      i like turning the page

1.3.24  8:47 pm   opinions on brazilian cuisine?

      no, that's because i don't know anything about it

1.3.24  6:58 pm   how do you decide that a mix is finished?

      when you want to do the next project more than you want to ever improve the current project. in some situations this decision may be made in advance

1.3.24  6:41 pm   Will you include a cat in any of your future videos?

      i wouldn't rule it out, but it's not necessarily the hottest thing on my goals list

1.3.24  5:36 pm   Is your first and foremost instrument the drum kit? I've had a kit for quite a while but a lack of enthusiasm sort of kept me away from me. Recently, I've been listening to a lot of Mitch Mitchell's stuff especially (not that relevant, I just like gushing about how good of a drummer he is). Aside from that, do you have any pointers for practice habits or just innovate ways to play the drums?

      the best suggestion i can give, which, weirdly a lot of learning drummers forget, is: don't forget to do it with the rest of the ensemble

1.3.24  4:57 pm   have you ever tried guitar?

      yes

1.3.24  3:43 pm   What is reality anyway

      it's the world you live in

1.3.24  3:22 pm   Do you believe in "truth"?

      not in that context

1.3.24  3:04 pm   Do you ever apply painting concepts like, value, for instance, to your visual department?

     sure

     It's an interesting exercise to see if something is still readable when you remove it's color. How strong your chosen values are, significantly determine how clear and effective the image will be.

1.3.24  2:38 pm   do you ask yourself questions on here

      no

1.3.24  2:21 pm   what should i write a comedy sketch about

      how about the berlin wall

1.3.24  2:11 pm   Bass lines confuse me. Ask me to come up with a bass line and my imagination ends at playing whole notes on the root - but I was just listening to Time Out of Mind for example and I was like "wow, this completely goes against my assumptions about what the bass should be doing." What's this secret magic everyone else is using and how do I get my hands on it?

      just get into a situation where you are expected to provide the bass for a song. over time, there is no one who doesn't figure out how to do this

1.3.24  1:57 pm   whats ur favorite word

      using different words together is the only thing that does it for me anymore

1.3.24  1:00 pm   actual question here, when youre writing a song do you ever look at lyrics youve written and go, "no. makes too much sense."

      i don't look at lyrics, i listen to the music all together with the words included. and that whole package, ideally, makes the big sense

1.3.24  12:41 pm   why do you post things online

      that's your fault

1.3.24  11:42 am   what is your opinion on the accordion

      it's fine but the biggest problem might be that your hands probably have to go at a very weird angle to play a real accordion. i'm not 100% sure whether this is true, i am not an accordion expert

1.3.24  11:19 am   what is the last thing you realized

      it's gonna be ok

1.3.24  10:54 am   do  you think it's okay to make covers of songs

     sure

     because i yet don't know how to play any instruments to the extent of being able to produce my own stuff

1.3.24  10:51 am   Is "chips" your best piece of music ever created

      no

1.3.24  10:34 am   what's your opinion on the public?

      it's pretty good

1.3.24  9:18 am   I know you probably get asked this question a lot but I'm trying to get into music to help self-expression but I have no idea how to start or what to do and I need advice

      this is not your fault, but, the problem with asking me that is i started doing music at such an early age i don't remember how it happened, and also my life circumstances then were probably different from what yours are now, mostly because i was a baby

1.3.24  8:59 am   HELLO! I NEED TO KNOW, F YOU EAT POTATO, DOES TOMATO COME OUT?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.3.24  8:50 am   what do you call the genre of music that you founded

      well in that case, might as well just call it 'bill wurtz'

1.3.24  8:06 am   why do i keep wanting to do the hard things when i always complain about how hard they are? why am i like this, i would just like to make sense and start wanting to do the easier things but i get bored when i try??? what am i supposed to do

      maybe take a nap

1.3.24  7:42 am   I forgot how to live. Can you help me remember?

      sure

1.3.24  7:36 am   have you ever gotten a question so coherent you wanted to gobble it up and eat it for breakfast

      sure

1.3.24  7:06 am   how do you decide what sentences/words need to be gradually revealed or "spoken" in the speech bubbles and which can just be fully visible at the moment the speech bubble appears?

     if the phrase is unique, especially near the end, then 'word pops' (individual words revealed one at a time) are more appropriate, so that the more unexpected words have an impact. but when it's a phrase that's more predictable, it's usually better shown all at once

     if you've created a script for animating text that way, could i see it?

      not yet

1.3.24  6:17 am   i used to love studying linguistics but now that i have to study linguistics i cant seem to enjoy it at all, why is the brain like this and how do i fix it

      that's because you're creative, but i don't know how to fix that

1.3.24  4:58 am   apologies if this is a stupid question. you mentioned not liking emojis because they aren't 'reliably consistent' -- do you have similar apprehensions about how people access your music? e.g. if i listen to a song of yours in a car vs on a speaker in a gym vs with headphones at home- do you think the experience is still consistent? and regardless- does this matter to you?

      the worst thing that can happen to audio is maybe the bass will disappear. sure, that's bad, but, it's not as bad as the whole song being replaced with an empty box. which is what happens when an emoji doesn't work

1.3.24  4:03 am   What's your favorite subject in highschool?

      french maybe

1.3.24  3:31 am   can I interview u 

      sure. i will try not to accidentally interview you instead

1.3.24  3:31 am   how many times a year do you misspell you're as your?

      approximately 0

1.3.24  3:27 am   Got any New Year's resolutions?

      i prefer real resolutions instead. i still have several of them going, including a major one from last march and another one from last may

1.3.24  2:02 am   How do I let go of all attachments to other people

      i don't know

1.3.24  1:56 am   do i invest into a personal lava moat around my house?

     only time will tell

     where would i find lava to put in the moat

      ikea maybe?

1.3.24  12:08 am   Hey got any grapes?

      no

1.2.24  11:43 pm   Are you an habitual dunker of cake/bread/cookies in milk? 

      no

1.2.24  11:41 pm   does perspective or opportunity give us more insight into what life may mean

      both are good ways, can't tell you who wins because the contest doesn't seem to end

1.2.24  11:29 pm   I'm having trouble getting out of C major scale

      try only playing in F# major for a week
